qas.question: When did Madonna drop out of college?
Which restaurant did Madonna work in New York City?
Where did Madonna take dance classes at in New York City?
How much did Madonna have when she first went to NYC?
What did she also work as for other established artists?

context: In <a0_0>1978<a0_0/>, she dropped out of college and relocated to New York City. She had little money and worked as a waitress at <a1_0>Dunkin' Donuts<a1_0/> and with modern dance troupes, taking classes at the <a2_0>Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater<a2_0/> and eventually performing with Pear Lang Dance Theater. Madonna said of her move to New York, "It was the first time I'd ever taken a plane, the first time I'd ever gotten a taxi cab. I came here with <a3_0>$35<a3_0/> in my pocket. It was the bravest thing I'd ever done." She started to work as a <a4_0>backup dancer<a4_0/> for other established artists. Madonna claimed that during a late night she was returning from a rehearsal, when a pair of men held her at knifepoint and forced her to perform fellatio. Madonna later commented that "the episode was a taste of my weakness, it showed me that I still could not save myself in spite of all the strong-girl show. I could never forget it."
